body.p:
482
March 16th 5
Capt
Wm C King
Frankfort Ky
Captain
Yours of the 4th ultimo to Gov Bramlette, has been referred to this Office for answer
It is not deemed advisable at present to increase the number of State Troops now in the field -- If in the future, it is determined to raise more, your claims will be received due attention

Very Respectfully
D. W Lindsey
Adjt Gen Ky
